vibesExplanation:
The workout vibes for this video align mainly with "The Zen Flow" and "The Deep Recharge." The use of terms like "guided meditation," "relax and release pelvic tension," and "connect with your core" in the title and description indicate a focus on grounding, intentional, and breath-centered exercises, which are core elements of 'The Zen Flow.' This is supported by user comments mentioning emotional release, suggesting a calming process to both physical and emotional tension, matching the vibe strongly with a score of 0.8.

The vibe of "The Deep Recharge" is also evident as the video provides a deeply calming, restorative experience, referred to in the description as perfect for those with "pelvic pain or pelvic floor dysfunction," which parallels the deep, nervous system recuperation depicted in 'The Deep Recharge.' This is further confirmed by comments recounting significant emotional and physical relief, scoring it at 0.7.

Finally, "The Reboot Workout" is present as a secondary vibe due to the emphasis on stress relief and the rejuvenating aspect of the guided relaxation, reflected in users feeling a sense of renewal and healing, scoring it at 0.6. There is minimal indication of high intensity or explosive movements; therefore, other active vibes are excluded.
